tweets.author_name: cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future
tweets.html:
You know, we didn't see #BreakingBad fans doing shit like this: Boston Fails To Celebrate Like It's Been There Before http://t.co/HpbR5QLMPG

— cybernetic sarCC of xmas past from the future (@sarCCastro) October 31, 2013

Finishing up my Sexy TV Network Exec costume...it's basically a blank cheque body suit with 'No notes EVER' written in the Memo line.

— Will Dixon (@wcdixon) October 31, 2013

There should be a word for when you realize you no longer give a crap about a show you used to love. DISappointment television.

— Jill Weinberger (@jillybobww) October 31, 2013

"Top Chef" leads me to believe that I would have a hard time eating a meal with Lea Michele.

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) October 31, 2013

Just do How I Met Your Mother again, only it's a woman searching for the right girl for her. I SOLVED YOUR PROBLEM, CBS.

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) October 31, 2013

Friend just started watching "Gossip Girl." If I spoil Gossip Girl's identity, that'll just make the show richer, right?

— Daniel Fienberg (@TheFienPrint) October 31, 2013

Anyone know any kids who are earnestly going as Hannah Montana this year? I want to hug them.

— Abbi Crutchfield (@curlycomedy) October 31, 2013

Happy Halloween. pic.twitter.com/ugLBMzAeNF

— Patrick Stewart (@SirPatStew) October 31, 2013

Where did Twitter look for its weekly dose of joy before Patrick Stewart started tweeting?

— Josh Spiegel (@mousterpiece) October 31, 2013

Dressing up as NBC for Halloween but to ensure it's as authentic as possible, none of you can look at me unless I'm singing.

— Richie (@RichieOnTV) October 31, 2013

My new Halloween favorite activity is desperately wishing it was Sunday and Good Wife was on.

— GrahamB (@losthero47) November 1, 2013

At the world's worst Halloween party, a fistfight breaks out between two guys dressed as Mr. Selfridge.

Okay Jake! YAAASSS WE BOUT TO BE LOVE & BASKETBALL #scandal

Fitz been watchin too many hood movies, he out here tryna win Liv's heart on the court #Scandal

Also, obviously, the Fitz Signal is a naked selfie. #Scandal

ur fi-yerrrrrred! #Scandal

The way Twitter talks about Quinn, you'd think she's married to the lead character of a show on AMC. #Scandal #MadMen #BreakingBad #TWD

Next episode of #Scandal: Liv and the gang throw a talent show; Quinn fucks it up by shooting everybody.

I really think they should send Quinn on a vacation around the world. That'll take whatâ€¦8, 9 months? #scandal #vanquishquinn

One should always close the bathroom door, regardless of what one is doing in there. #Scandal

I have all these feelings though. I HAVE ALL THESE FEELINGS. HELP ME. I'M DROWNING IN A BAD ROMANCE. #scandal

Not sure if the dress was walking Liv or if she was walking the dress. Either way it worked. #Scandal

Whewwwwww Olivia had that "I'mma get me some!" strut until Mellie flopped her whole show. Lol. #ScandaI

AttENTION. ATTENTION BLACK LADIES: OLIVIA POPE IS WEARING A FRENCH ROLL. Can the church say Amen? YASSS. That French roll. #scandal

Oh my word. Oh Mellie. Ohhh Mellie. I would cry for you but your hair is seriously getting in my way. #scandal

— Irascibly Ornery Dr. KW (@kristenwarner) November 1, 2013

"Please use your magical vagina to save my husband." #Scandal

— Jamie Doesn't Like Tall People. (@thewayoftheid) November 1, 2013

Quinn hasn't even said a word & I can already hear half of Twitter going, "SHUT UP, QUINN!" #Scandal

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) November 1, 2013

#Scandal gonna #Scandal

— brian (@AdmiraltyPirate) November 1, 2013

Y'all see they dun gave Quinn a gun. Listen, Shonda Rhimes is trying to tell us something. #scandal

— Irascibly Ornery Dr. KW (@kristenwarner) November 1, 2013

I feel like Florida Evans after watching that episode of #Scandal #DamnDamnDamn

— Jack Norman (@TheJackNorman) November 1, 2013

And this Thursday evening ends w/ Twitter choosing between #TeamDiahannCarroll or #TeamPhyliciaRashad for Mama Pope. Choose wisely. #Scandal

— hellresidentNY (@hellresidentNY) November 1, 2013

#MayaPope is NOT dead, and when Phylicia Rashad gracefully steps into frame on my television, I will scream, then ascend to the Upper Room.

— Artisanal Shadester (@agendadebonaire) November 1, 2013

Has a true scientist dug into the correlation between episode quality and the height of Mellie's hair? #scandal

— Blerg (@MediaObsessed) November 1, 2013

A #Scandal spin-off where Mellie. That's all I've got. Maybe shirtless Scott Foley too. I think I'm on to something, Shonda. Text me.

— LaToya Ferguson (@lafergs) November 1, 2013

God, what the hell is with Mellie's hair? It looks like she's wearing an inferior Suzanne Sugarbaker wig. #Scandal #DesigningWomen

— Libby Hill (@midwestspitfire) November 1, 2013

Regular spray starches? No sweetie... Only professional streamers for me. That's like Olivia drinking box wine. NO NO NOT IN MY HOUSE!

— You've Been Pope'd (@OliviasCoat) November 1, 2013
